TarotDroid is an application that helps you count easily your 3, 4 or 5 player style tarot games. It also allows you to store and keep track of your games.

New with version 4: you can now publish and share your games on your Facebook page.

This is a limited version that allows you to store only 5 game sets. Of course you can still count game points for more than 3 game sets, but the games won\'t be stored. A unlmited commercial version will be available any time soon on the Android Maket.

TarotDroid was created to suit the special needs of a group of players, because the other applications available on the Market didn\'t suit them. For instance, TarotDroid :
- can help you count points for tarot games including a \'dead\' player: at each deal, a player doesn\'t, play he\'s said to be \'dead\'.
- supports \'Belgian\' style game.
Both these features have nothing to do with official rules and hence aren\'t activated by default. To use them, you need to activate them in TarotDroid\'s global preferences.

Many thanks to :
- AChartEngine\'s team for their free charting framework.
- Jake WHARTON for both frameworks ActionBarSherlock and ViewPageIndicator.
- Paul BURKE for his file selector library aFileChooser.
- Kevin GAUDIN for his crash report library ACRA.

Any suggestions, criticisms or questions are welcome! Send-them to tarotdroid@gmail.com or post them directly on TarotDroid\'s Facebook wall.

Two different views of your game set are available:

 - either a full game table.
 - or a global synthesis by player. To switch between these views, just swype the screen horizontally or click on any title above.

Several features are available through the action bar at he top:
- Add a new game.
- Add a new belgian game (avaible only if activated in the preferences).
- Display game set statistics, especially a score evolution chart for each player.
- Modify the preferences.

For each new game, a line is added to the scores table :
- The taker can be distinguished by a small yellow Droid.
- For 5 players style, the called player can be distinguished by the called king color.
- Defense players are all of the same color.
The global synthesis is also updated.

Furthermore, it is also possible to display each game and to delete the last game by long clicking on the corresponding line.

Have fun !

TO TRANSLATE : A l\'inverse du tarot officiel, l\'objectif de la belge est de réaliser le moins de points possibles à la fin du jeu. Le premier est celui qui réalise le moins de points, le dernier est celui qui réalise le plus de points.

La belge peut etre utilisée pour forcer les joueurs \'frileux\' à prendre, afin d\'éviter de nombreux tours de disribution sans annonce. En effet, un joueur qui a une poignée ou de nombreuses têtes mais qui n\'annonce rien prend le risque de ganger de nombreux plis et ainsi de perdre à la belge.

For three players, points are computed as follows:
- the first earns %1$s points.
- the second earns no point.
- the third looses %1$s points.

You can use bluetooth to transfer a game set from one device to another. To do so, you need to follow the steps below :

Step 1 - First of all, you need to activate bluetooth on both devices.
Step 2 - On the receiving device, click on \'Get discoverable\' then answer \'Yes\' to the system question.
Step 3 - On the sending device, click on \'Discover devices\'. For 12 seconds this device is going to seach for discoverable devices.
Step 4 - Once the discovery is over, on the receiving device click on \'Download\': it now waits for a connection.
Step 5 - On the sending device, long click on a game set, pick \'Send with bluetooth\' and select the wainting device among the list of discovered devices.

In a few seconds, the game set is transfered and stored on the receving device. You can then display it, display its statistics or even carry on by adding new games.
